content:
Yes, there are many interesting nearby towns and cities you could consider visiting when you're in Passau. Here are a few suggestions:

1. Regensburg - This is a charming medieval city located about 1.5 hours from Passau by car or train. Its old town is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
2. Linz - This vibrant Austrian city is just an hour and a half away from Passau and offers many cultural and historic attractions, including a beautiful old town and several museums.
3. Cesky Krumlov - This picturesque town in the Czech Republic is about two hours from Passau and has a well-preserved old town that is also a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
4. Salzburg - This historic city in Austria is about two and a half hours from Passau and is known for its beautiful baroque architecture and association with Mozart.

These are just a few examples of the many places you can visit from Passau. Depending on your interests and how much time you have, there are many other options to consider as well.
